author: Darrell Etherington
title: Frontiers launches a portal to help connect coronavirus and COVID-19 research with funding
description: Open science platform and publisher Frontiers wants to make sure that efforts by researchers to pursue science-based solutions to the global coronavirus pandemic, and learn more about the virus and the COVID-19 disease it causes, find the funding they need. T…
